meanings.definition: The manner in which a game is played
meanings.sent1: The gameplay of the board game was fun and exciting.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the gameplay of this video game because it is challenging.
meanings.sent3: The gameplay of the card game made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her gameplay in the soccer match was like a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The gameplay of the puzzle was so engaging that I lost track of time.

meanings.definition: The interactive aspects of a game that involve the player
meanings.sent1: The gameplay of the app allows you to interact with different characters.
meanings.sent2: The gameplay of the online game requires quick reflexes.
meanings.sent3: His gameplay strategy was unexpected but effective.
meanings.sent4: The gameplay of the virtual reality game felt like diving into another world.
meanings.sent5: The gameplay of the arcade game was so immersive that I felt like I was inside it.
